Obtains a {{c|std::chrono::local_time&lt;duration&gt;}} representing the local time in the time zone corresponding to the time point {{c|*this}} represents.

===Return value===
A {{c|std::chrono::local_time&lt;duration&gt;}} computed as if by {{c|zone-&gt;to_local(get_sys_time())}}, where {{tt|zone}} is the non-static data member holding the stored time zone pointer.
